#loginfailed.en: Incorrect e‑mail address or incorrect password.
#loginfailed.gd: Seòladh post‑d ceàrr no facal‑faire ceàrr.

#siteslogan.en: We are transcribing Scotland’s oral heritage
#siteslogan.gd: Tha sinn a’ tar‑sgrìobhadh beul‑aithris na h‑Alba

#homepageblurb.en: Opening the Well is a crowdsourcing platform where volunteers are transcribing Gaelic language recordings. Together, we are building a corpus of transcribed speech which will enrich Scotland’s intangible cultural heritage, bolster Gaelic research and lexicography, and improve speech recognition technology in Gaelic.
#homepageblurb.gd: Tha Fosgladh an Tobair na làrach sluagh‑obrachail anns a bheil saor‑thoilich a' tar‑sgrìobhadh chlàraidhean sa Ghàidhlig. Còmhla ri chèile, tha sinn a' togail corpas de chainnt tar‑sgrìobhte a chuireas gu mòr ri dùthchas na h‑Alba, rannsachadh air cànanachas agus faclaireachd agus adhartas ann an teicneòlas aithneachadh labhairt na Gàidhlig.

#hourminustessofar.en: Hours and minutes of speech transcribed so far
#hourminustessofar.gd: Uairean agus mionaidean de labhairt tar‑sgrìobhte cheana

#finished.gd: Tar‑sgrìobhte aig $, a’ feitheamh ri ceadachadh

#approve.en: Approve, this is good to go

#reject.gd: Diùlt, leig le cuideigin tòiseachadh a‑rithist

#decidelater.gd: Nì mi co‑dhùnadh aig àm eile

#givenup1.en: This track has already been partially transcribed by someone else.
#givenup1.gd: Chaidh pàirt dhen clàr seo a thar‑sgrìobhadh aig cuideigin eile cheana.

#givenup2.en: You can continue where they left off, or delete and start from scratch.
#givenup2.gd: Faodaidh tu tòiseachadh far an do stad iad, no cur às dha agus tòiseachadh a‑rithist.

#trackwaiting.en: This track is waiting for someone to volunteer to transcribe it.
#trackwaiting.gd: Tha an clàr seo ri a thar‑sgrìobhadh fhathast.

#trackownedbyanother.en: This track is being transcribed by another user.
#trackownedbyanother.gd: Tha an clàr seo ga thar‑sgrìobhadh aig cuideigin eile.

#findsomethingelse.gd: Lorg rudeigin eile a thar‑sgrìobhas tu

#trackownedbyvolunteer.en: This track is being transcribed by a volunteer transcriber.
#trackownedbyvolunteer.gd: Tha an clàr seo ga thar‑sgrìobhadh aig cuideigin eile.

#trackwaitingforapproval.en: This track has recently been transcribed by a volunteer transcriber and is awaiting approval.
#trackwaitingforapproval.gd: Chaidh an clàr seo a thar‑sgrìobhadh aig cuideigin o chionn ghoirid agus tha e a’ feitheamh ri a cheadachadh.

#addanewtrack.en: Add a track from Tobar an Dualchais
#addanewtrack.gd: Tog clàr bho Thobar an Dualchais

#trackalreadyexists.gd: Tha an clàr seo againn mar thà.

#errortalkingtotadapi.en: An error has occurred while getting data from Tobar an Dualchais.
#errortalkingtotadapi.gd: Thachair mearachd is sinn a' feuchainn ri dàta fhaighinn bho Thobar an Dualchais.

#nosuchtrack.en: No such track exists in Tobar an Dualchais.
#nosuchtrack.gd: Chan eil an clàr seo ann an Tobar an Dualchais

#signupblurb1.en: By joining as a volunteer transcriber, you will be helping us to build better speech recognition tools for Gaelic and you will be making Scotland’s oral heritage accessible to a wider audience.
#signupblurb1.gd: Le bhith dol nar cuideachd mar tar‑sgrìobhadair saor‑thoileach, bheir thu taic dhuinn le bhith a' togail uidheamachd aithneachadh labhairt airson na Gàidhlig agus nì thu cinnteach gum faigh barrachd dhaoine eòlas air dùthchas na h‑Alba.

#signupblurb2.en: You will be transcribing recordings of people speaking Scottish Gaelic. What's it like?
#signupblurb2.gd: Bidh thu a' tar‑sgrìobhadh chlàraidhean de dhaoine a' bruidhinn na Gàidhlig. Cò ris a tha seo coltach?

#signupblurb3.en: You can transcribe as much or as little as you want. Fill out this registration form to start.
#signupblurb3.gd: Tar‑sgrìobh an uiread a thogras tu. Lìon am foirm‑clàraidh seo gus tòiseachadh.

#displaynamelegend.en: Enter your real name or a nickname. This will be used to publicly identify you on this website. You will be able to change this later.
#displaynamelegend.gd: Cuir a‑staidh t' ainm no t' fhar‑ainm. Cleachar seo mar ainm poblach na làraich seo. Faodaidh tu atharrachadh a‑rithist.

#displaynamemustnotbeblank.en: Your display name must not be empty.
#displaynamemustnotbeblank.gd: Chan fhaod t' ainm‑taisbeanaidh a bhith bàn.

#emaillegend.en: You will use this to log in. Your e‑mail address will never be shown publicly or shared with third parties.
#emaillegend.gd: Cleachdaidh tu seo airson logadh a‑staidh. Cha taisbeanar do sheòladh p‑d gu poblach ach cha toirear e do threas‑phàrtaidhean gu bràth.

#emailmustnotbeblank.en: Your e‑mail address must not be empty.
#emailmustnotbeblank.gd: Chan fhaod do sheòladh p‑d a bhith bàn.

#emailalreadytaken.en: This e‑mail address already has an account here.
#emailalreadytaken.gd: Tha am seòladh p‑d sin air a chleachdadh a cheanna an seo.

#passwordlegend.en: Choose a password for yourself. You will use this to log in.
#passwordlegend.gd: Tagh facal‑faire dhut fhèin. Cleachdaidh tu sin airson logadh‑staigh.

#passwordmustnotbeblank.en: Your password must not be empty.
#passwordmustnotbeblank.gd: Chan fhaod t' fhacal‑faire a bhith bàn.

#afterregistration.en: After registration, we will send you an e‑mail with a link to confirm your e‑mail address.
#afterregistration.gd: An dèidh dhut clàradh, cuiridh sinn p‑d thugad le ceangail gus an seòladh p‑d agad a dhearbhadh.

#registrationaccepted.en: Your registration has been accepted. We have sent you an e‑mail with a link to confirm your e‑mail address.
#registrationaccepted.gd: Ghabh sinn ris a' chlàradh agad. Chuir sinn p‑d thugad le ceangail gus an seòladh p‑d agad a dhearbhadh.

#emailshouldarrive.en: The e‑mail should arrive immediately. If it doesn't, check your spam folder.
#emailshouldarrive.gd: Bu chòir dhan phost‑dhealain ruighinn air ball. Mur an ruig e, coimhead sa phasgan‑spama agad.

#emailconfirmed.en: Your e‑mail address has been confirmed.
#emailconfirmed.gd: Chaidh an seòladh p‑d agad a dhearbhachadh.

#emailwelcomeline1.en: Please click the link below to confirm your e‑mail address and to complete your registration as a volunteer transcriber.
#emailwelcomeline1.gd: Gliog air a' cheangail shìos gus an seòladh p‑d agad a dhearbhachadh agus an clàradh agad a chrìochnachadh mar tar‑sgrìobhadair saor‑thoileach.

#emailwelcomeexplanation.en: You are receiving this e‑mail because you registered as a volunteer transcriber on our website. If that wasn't you, you can safely ignore this e‑mail.
#emailwelcomeexplanation.gd: Fhuair thu am post‑dealain seo on a chlàraich thu mar tar‑sgrìobhadair saor‑thoileach air ar làraich‑linn. Mura tusa a rinn sin, faodaidh tu cur às dhen phost‑dealain seo gu sàbhailte.

#abouttodeletetrack.en: This track is about to be deleted.
#abouttodeletetrack.gd: Tha an clàr seo gu sguabadh às.
